name: Arbitrium (GroZ'Yeux)
description:
CONTENT WARNINGS : Death, violence (including sexual violence), self-harm, basically a whole lot of depressing stuff ! Yay !

The game is great, but if you're sensitive you might want not to play. Maybe try a game and see how it goes ? But don't force yourself if you're feeling uncomfortable !

Warning  If you play in your browser, make sure you're not in private navigation ! Else you won't be able to save your achievements !

A game made by students of the ENSIIE & the LPJV at Bobigny University for the Unijam 2020 !

ENSIIE Students : Aristide 'GroZ'Yeux' Auphan (Code), Basile 'Buddy' Bonicel (Music), Milan 'Jalik' Gabbay (Code) and Kelly 'Pixie' Minotti (Code)

LPJV Bobigny Students : Manaut 'Adament' Berton-Boitel (Art), Gorik 'Sioum' Gazarian (Sound Design & Code), Anthony 'Elkiah' Danis (Art) and Ryan 'Étoile' Mokhefi (Game Design & Writing)

And Red 'Mikan' Ash, our writer !
